name: Go Nuts Game
description:
Go Nuts! the latest game to be introduced by MoKooL Apps. Go Nuts is a amazing fun, extremely addictive and  keeps you coming back again and again, collecting even more nuts each time trying to beat your highest score.

This cute, nutty squirrel is armed with his trusty slingshot knock down as many nuts as he can while trying to avoid exploding bombs. Game Over.... if you hit too many bombs, and the adventure starts again.

Play the classic game and earn extra lives or play against the clock and see how many nuts you can shot down in 1:00. And if you are really feeling adventurous try the advance version of the game with two row on the ever speeding carousel.

Download and play Go Nuts!!!
